description:
Luffy has a run-in with Captain Smoker, and his failure to keep a low profile helps Buggy draw a bead on him. Elsewhere, Zoro takes a chance that his skill can overcome a dangerous curse.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kitetsu III and Yubashiri! Zoro`s New Swords and the Woman Sergeant Major!
Sandai Kitetsu et Yubashiri ! Les nouveaux sabres de Zoro
Sandai Kitetsu to Yubashiri! Zoro no Shintou to Onna Souchou
Новые мечи Зоро и девушка — главный старшина
ซันไดคิเทซึและดาบยูบาชิริ ดาบใหม่ของโซโล! หมวดจ่าหญิง!
三代鬼徹と雪走! ゾロの新刀と女曹長
